abstract_ssm: The purpose of the Historic American Buildings Survey (HABS), a division of the National Parks Service, is to document historic structure and preserve architectural heritage. The Center for Brooklyn History is the official repository for HABS reports of Brooklyn buildings. This is an assembled collection of HABS reports that have been deposited with CBH.
